      static WebId WebId.NULL_WEB_ID
      The one and only NULL webId.
      Methods in node that return WebId 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Methods in node with parameters of type WebId 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean WebId.isFoldOf(WebId webId)
      Tests whether or not this is the fold of webId.
      boolean WebId.isInverseSurrogateFoldOf(WebId webId)
      Tests whether or not this is the inverse surrogate fold to webId.
      boolean WebId.isNeighborOf(WebId webId)
      Tests whether or not this is a neighbor of the webId.
      boolean WebId.isSurrogateFoldOf(WebId webId)
      Tests whether or not this is the surrogate fold to webId.
      boolean WebId.isSurrogateNeighborOf(WebId webId)
      Tests whether or not this is a surrogate neighbor of webId.

      A webId x is the surrogate neighbor of a node y iff
                   x.height + 1 = y.height AND
                   y.toString().charAt(y.toString()-1) = '1' AND -- the high order bit of y is 1.
      void Node.setWebId(WebId newWebId) 
      void NodeInterface.setWebId(WebId webId)
